column1: #Text=Katara says : " It 's those three girls from Omashu ! "
#Text=" Toph says : " Oh , I 'm sorry , I did n't count you .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I can still fight !
#Text=" Toph says : " Okay , three on three plus Sokka .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Well , we wanted to find out who they were and we found out .
#Text=" Katara says : " I ca n't believe those girls followed us all the way from Omashu .
#Text=" Toph says : " I still think we could have taken them .
#Text=" Katara says : " Are you kidding me ?
#Text=The crazy blue firebending and the flying daggers are bad enough , but last time we saw them , one of those girls did something that took my bending away .
